name: Delay1
description: One sample delay. Delays the input signal by exactly one sample.

name: Delay2
description: Two sample delay. Delays the input signal by exactly two samples.

name: DelayN
description: Simple delay line with no interpolation. Most efficient but can cause aliasing.

inputs.name: maxdelaytime
inputs.description: Maximum delay time in seconds. Sets buffer size, cannot be modulated

inputs.name: delaytime
inputs.description: Delay time in seconds. Can be modulated

name: DelayL
description: Delay line with linear interpolation. Smoother than DelayN when delay time is modulated.

name: DelayC
description: Delay line with cubic interpolation. Highest quality, best for pitch shifting delays.

name: CombN
description: Comb delay line with no interpolation. Creates resonances at harmonics of 1/delay time.

inputs.name: decaytime
inputs.description: Time for echoes to decay by 60dB

name: CombL
description: Comb delay line with linear interpolation. Smoother comb filtering than CombN.

inputs.name: decaytime
inputs.description: Time for echoes to decay by 60dB

name: CombC
description: Comb delay line with cubic interpolation. Highest quality comb filtering.

inputs.name: decaytime
inputs.description: Time for echoes to decay by 60dB

name: AllpassN
description: All pass delay line with no interpolation. Passes all frequencies but changes phase.

inputs.name: decaytime
inputs.description: Time for echoes to decay by 60dB

name: AllpassL
description: All pass delay line with linear interpolation. Smoother phase response than AllpassN.

inputs.name: decaytime
inputs.description: Time for echoes to decay by 60dB

name: AllpassC
description: All pass delay line with cubic interpolation. Highest quality all pass filtering.

inputs.name: decaytime
inputs.description: Time for echoes to decay by 60dB
